text: Where do you currently live and who do you live with?
What do you like or dislike about living in your current place?
What kind of course have you taken recently, and why did you choose it?
What did you learn from the last course you took, and how has it helped you?
Are you currently a student, an office worker, or something else? Tell me about your main role.
What are your main responsibilities in your school or workplace?
Could you briefly introduce yourself, including your name, where you live, and what you do?
Tell me about your family. Who do you live with and what are they like?
What does a typical day look like for you from morning to night?
Describe your home and the area where you live.
How has your living situation changed over the past few years?
If you could move to a different type of housing, where would you like to live and why?
Are you currently studying or working? Describe your major or your job.
What do you like most about your major or your current job?
What is one challenge you face in your studies or work, and how do you deal with it?
Describe the place where you usually study or work. What does it look like?
Do you prefer studying or working at home, in an office, or in a cafe? Why?
How has your study or work environment changed recently?
Tell me about a memorable trip you took within your country. Where did you go and what did you do?
What city or place in your country would you recommend to visitors, and why?
How do you usually plan your trips when you travel inside your country?
Tell me about an overseas trip you have taken. Where did you go and what stood out to you?
Do you prefer traveling abroad or within your country? Explain why.
Which country would you most like to visit in the future, and what would you like to do there?
Have you ever gone camping? Describe one camping trip in detail.
What do you usually prepare or bring when you go camping?
What do you enjoy most about camping, and is there anything you dislike about it?
Do you enjoy hiking? Where do you usually go hiking?
Tell me about a memorable hiking experience you had.
What do you think are the benefits of hiking for your health or mind?
What kind of exercise do you usually do to stay healthy?
Describe your workout routine. How often and where do you exercise?
Has your exercise habit changed over time? If so, how and why?
What kind of music do you enjoy listening to, and when do you usually listen to it?
Have you ever learned to play a musical instrument? Tell me about that experience.
Tell me about a memorable concert or live performance you have attended.
What types of movies or TV shows do you enjoy, and why do you like them?
Tell me about a movie or TV show you watched recently. What was it about?
Do you prefer watching movies at home or in a theater? Explain your preference.
Do you enjoy reading? What genres or types of books do you like?
Tell me about a book that left a strong impression on you.
Where and when do you usually read, and why do you prefer that environment?
Do you play video games? What kinds of games do you enjoy the most?
Tell me about a memorable gaming experience you have had.
Do you prefer playing games alone or with friends? Why?
Do you enjoy taking photos? What do you usually like to photograph?
Tell me about one of your favorite photos that you have taken.
How has your interest in photography changed over time, if at all?
Do you enjoy cooking or baking? What dishes do you usually make?
Tell me about a memorable cooking or baking experience you have had.
Is there a dish you are especially confident in making? Describe how you prepare it.
Let me give you a situation. Imagine a close friend asks you for advice about stress. What would you say to help them?
Describe a challenging moment you faced recently and explain how you handled it.
Tell me about a time when you had to make an important decision. What did you decide and why?
Imagine you have to give a short presentation in English about your life. What main points would you include?
